title: Does PES do some kind of rank manipulation like VIT?
content: I have a friend who got a rank of 1xx in pessat, but has a rank of 58k in comedk. I could've understood if he had gotten under 10k in comedk and that it must've been due to bad luck that he got a bad rank but 58k is absolutely unimaginable. And how the actual fuck did this guy get a tripple digit rank in pessat

comments.body:
Maybe he was lucky enough to have a topper sitting in front of him.. 

1xx in pessat and 60k in comedk is a frking joke.. happens everytime in most of the exams.. I know a person with 98.7 % in jee mains.. well guess what, same dude got 60\~ish % in 2nd attempt.. dude used to cheat in all mocks and every carried a cell phone to pre-boards.. 

Imagine how many across India might have cheated their way into top clgs.. happens everywhr..
Bro used up all his luck.

Well maybe

But I think everyone deserves to top/get amazing score in one exam at least imo

Like I missed the jee cutoff and ain't expecting much in kcet but still got 4xx in pessat lol ( didn't copy or anything like that)
similar case here.. missed cutoff by 0.x
Very high chance he cheated or maybe he lucked out, who knows?
